about_the_game:
This is the story of you and your wife. Since it's your story, you get to decide the protagonist's gender! Every day, you come home from work to spend time with your wife who loves you more than anything and you feel the same, hoping the time that you both spend together will last forever. Things aren't always perfect though. Both of you are going to make mistakes, but that's not gonna stop the two of you from loving each other, right?

How you will spend time with your wife is up to you. Of course, you can always be a good spouse and treat her right, but if you make certain decisions, she definitely won't be happy. There are at least a few ways things can turn out depending on your actions, whether they're good or bad. Things are gonna get tough, but that's not gonna separate the two of you. Besides, it's not like either of you is hiding anything from the other... right? Spend time reading this story, make decisions and see how your wife ends up because of them.

Features:
- Nameable Protagonist
- Nameable Wife
- 3 Gender Choices
- Multiple Endings

content_descriptors.notes: There are scenes that in the game that contain violence, with text mentioning gore, murder, and self-harm/suicide.
